text: Cheloveku My zapovedali delat' dobro svoim roditelyam. Mat' yego nosit yego vo chreve s trudom i rozhdayet yego s trudom: nosheniye yego vo chreve i kormleniye yego grud'yu - tridtsat' mesyatsev. A so vremenem, kogda dostigayet polnogo svoyego vozrasta, kogda dostigayet chetyredesyati let, on govorit: "Gospodi! Vnushi dushe moyey byt' blagodarnym za Tvoi blagodeyaniya, kotorymi oblagodetel'stvoval Ty menya i moikh roditeley, i delat' dobroye, ugodnoye Tebe; daruy schastiye mne v moyem potomstve. S pokayaniyem obrashchayus' k Tebe, i ya odin iz pokornykh Tebe
